mapper.select: /* LendDao.selectLendRankList */ SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A1.CNT DESC,NM ASC)) AS ranking ,A1.* FROM ( SELECT A.PACKAGEID ,COUNT(B.PACKAGEINDVDID) CNT ,C.PACKAGE_NM NM FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_APLY A INNER JOIN TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_APLY_DLIVY B ON A.APLYID = B.APLYID INNER JOIN TB_THA_PACKAGE C ON A.PACKAGEID = C.PACKAGEID GROUP BY A.PACKAGEID ,C.PACKAGE_NM LIMIT 10 ) A1

/* LendDao.selectLendList */
SELECT A.RCRITID ,A.RCRIT_NM ,A.BGNG_DT ,A.END_DT ,A.LMT_CD ,A.DTL_CN ,A.MVP_URL ,A.MVP_PSTN_CD ,A.ATENT_MTTR ,IFNULL(A.RPRS_IMG_FILEID,0) RPRS_IMG_FILEID ,A.DTL_IMG_FILEGRPID ,A.MAP_FILEGRPID ,A.EDU_PHOTO_FILEGRPID ,A.OPER_YN ,A.MDFCN_DT ,A.MDFRID ,A.REG_DT ,A.RGTRID ,B.TYPE_CD ,B.PACKAGE_NM ,B.TEAM_CMPSTN_CD ,B.EDU_TYPE_CD ,C.EDU_SBJCT_CD ,C.EDU_SBJCT_CD_NM ,D.EDU_TRGT_CD ,D.EDU_TRGT_CD_NM ,CASE WHEN BGNG_DT > NOW() THEN 'W' WHEN END_DT < NOW() THEN 'E' ELSE 'C' END AS PERIOD_STTS ,E.FILE_IDNTFC_KEY AS rprsImgFileKey FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_RCRIT A INNER JOIN TB_THA_PACKAGE B ON A.PACKAGEID = B.PACKAGEID INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.PACKAGEID ,GROUP_CONCAT(A.EDU_SBJCT_CD_NM,'/') EDU_SBJCT_CD_NM ,GROUP_CONCAT(EDU_SBJCT_CD) EDU_SBJCT_CD FROM( SELECT A.PACKAGEID ,D.CD_NM ,D.CD ,CONCAT(D.CD_NM,'-',GROUP_CONCAT(C.CD_NM)) EDU_SBJCT_CD_NM ,GROUP_CONCAT(C.CD) EDU_SBJCT_CD FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE A INNER JOIN TB_THA_PACKAGE_EDU_SBJCT_MAPNG B ON A.PACKAGEID = B.PACKAGEID INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD C ON B.EDU_SBJCT_CD = C.CD INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD D ON C.UPPR_CD = D.CD WHERE C.CDGRPID = '155' GROUP BY A.PACKAGEID,D.CD ) A GROUP BY PACKAGEID ) C ON B.PACKAGEID = C.PACKAGEID INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.PACKAGEID ,GROUP_CONCAT(C.CD_NM) EDU_TRGT_CD_NM ,GROUP_CONCAT(C.CD) EDU_TRGT_CD FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE A INNER JOIN TB_THA_PACKAGE_EDU_TRGT_MAPNG B ON A.PACKAGEID = B.PACKAGEID INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD C ON B.EDU_TRGT_CD = C.CD GROUP BY A.PACKAGEID ) D ON B.PACKAGEID = D.PACKAGEID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_FILE E ON A.RPRS_IMG_FILEID = E.FILEID WHERE 1=1 AND A.OPER_YN = 'Y'
AND A.RCRIT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{rcritNm},'%')
AND EDU_TRGT_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{eduTrgtCd},'%')
AND TYPE_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{typeCd },'%')
AND EDU_SBJCT_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{eduSbjctCd},'%')
AND EDU_TYPE_CD = #{eduTypeCd}

/* LendDao.selectLend */ SELECT A.RCRITID ,A.RCRIT_NM ,A.BGNG_DT ,A.PACKAGEID ,A.END_DT ,A.LMT_CD ,A.DTL_CN ,A.MVP_URL ,A.MVP_PSTN_CD ,A.ATENT_MTTR ,IFNULL(A.RPRS_IMG_FILEID,0) RPRS_IMG_FILEID ,A.DTL_IMG_FILEGRPID ,A.MAP_FILEGRPID ,A.EDU_PHOTO_FILEGRPID ,A.OPER_YN ,A.MDFCN_DT ,A.MDFRID ,A.REG_DT ,A.RGTRID ,B.TYPE_CD ,B.EDU_TYPE_CD ,B.PACKAGE_NM ,B.TEAM_CMPSTN_CD ,C.EDU_SBJCT_CD ,C.EDU_SBJCT_CD_NM ,D.EDU_TRGT_CD ,D.EDU_TRGT_CD_NM ,CASE WHEN BGNG_DT > NOW() THEN 'W' WHEN END_DT < NOW() THEN 'E' ELSE 'C' END AS PERIOD_STTS FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_RCRIT A INNER JOIN TB_THA_PACKAGE B ON A.PACKAGEID = B.PACKAGEID INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.PACKAGEID ,CONCAT(D.CD_NM ,'-',GROUP_CONCAT(C.CD_NM)) EDU_SBJCT_CD_NM ,GROUP_CONCAT(C.CD) EDU_SBJCT_CD FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE A INNER JOIN TB_THA_PACKAGE_EDU_SBJCT_MAPNG B ON A.PACKAGEID = B.PACKAGEID INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD C ON B.EDU_SBJCT_CD = C.CD INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD D ON C.UPPR_CD = D.CD GROUP BY A.PACKAGEID ) C ON B.PACKAGEID = C.PACKAGEID INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.PACKAGEID ,GROUP_CONCAT(C.CD_NM) EDU_TRGT_CD_NM ,GROUP_CONCAT(C.CD) EDU_TRGT_CD FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE A INNER JOIN TB_THA_PACKAGE_EDU_TRGT_MAPNG B ON A.PACKAGEID = B.PACKAGEID INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD C ON B.EDU_TRGT_CD = C.CD GROUP BY A.PACKAGEID ) D ON B.PACKAGEID = D.PACKAGEID WHERE 1=1 AND RCRITID = #{rcritid}

/* LendDao.selectLendRndList */ SELECT A.ORDR -- 차수 ,A.QNTY -- 수량 ,A.BGNG_DE ,A.END_DE ,A.RNDID ,A.QNTY - IFNULL(B.RESERVATION_CNT,0) AS totalCnt ,IFNULL(B.RESERVATION_CNT,0) RESERVATION_CNT ,CASE WHEN END_DE < date_format(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN 'L' WHEN (QNTY - B.RESERVATION_CNT) <= 0 THEN 'S' ELSE 'O' END AS STTS_CD FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_RND A LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT A.RNDID -- 차시 아이디 ,IFNULL(SUM(A.QNTY),0) AS RESERVATION_CNT FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_APLY A WHERE 1=1 AND A.STTS_CD = '231102' GROUP BY A.RNDID ) B ON A.RNDID = B.RNDID WHERE 1=1 AND A.RCRITID = #{rcritid} ORDER BY A.ORDR ASC

/* LendDao.selectLendList */
SELECT A.RVW_SCR ,A.RVW_CN ,A.RGTRID ,B.ACNT RGTR_ACNT ,B.NM RGTR_NM ,A.REG_DT FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_APLY A INNER JOIN TB_CMM_USER B ON A.RGTRID = B.USERID WHERE 1=1 AND A.STTS_CD = '231102' AND A.RVW_CN IS NOT NULL AND A.APLYID IN ( SELECT B.APLYID FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_RND A INNER JOIN TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_APLY B ON A.RNDID = B.RNDID WHERE 1=1 AND A.RCRITID = #{rcritid} ) -- ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC
/* TchaidDao.selectTchaidCdList */ SELECT A.CD ,concat(B.CD_NM,'>',A.CD_NM ) CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD A INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD B ON A.UPPR_CD = B.CD WHERE 1=1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CDGRPID = '155'
/* LendDao.selectRequestLendRndList */ SELECT A.RNDID ,A.ORDR -- 차수 ,A.QNTY -- 수량 ,A.BGNG_DE ,A.END_DE FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_RND A WHERE 1=1 AND RNDID = #{rndid} ORDER BY A.ORDR ASC

/* LendDao.selectRequestInstInfo */ SELECT A.INSTID ,A.INST_NM ,A.ZIP ,A.INST_TYPE_CD ,A.ADDR ,A.ADDR_DTL ,A.TELNO ,C.CTPRVN_NM ,LEFT(A.RGN_CD,2) CTPRVN_CD ,B.NM ,B.EML ,B.MOBLPHON FROM TB_CMM_INST A INNER JOIN TB_CMM_USER B ON A.INSTID = B.INSTID INNER JOIN TB_CMM_ADDR_CTPRVN C ON LEFT(A.RGN_CD,2) = C.CTPRVN_CD WHERE 1=1 AND B.USERID = #{user.userid}

/* LendDao.checkOverStockYn */ SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN IFNULL(A.QNTY,0) - IFNULL(B.RESERVATION_CNT,0) -C.Qnty < 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) isOverCnt FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_RND A LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT A.RNDID -- 차시 아이디 ,IFNULL(SUM(A.QNTY),0) AS RESERVATION_CNT FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_APLY A WHERE 1=1 AND A.STTS_CD = '231102' GROUP BY A.RNDID ) B ON A.RNDID = B.RNDID INNER JOIN ( SELECT #{rndid} AS RNDID ,#{qnty} AS Qnty ) C ON A.RNDID = C.RNDID WHERE 1=1 AND A.RCRITID = #{rcritid}

/* LendDao.checkLimitOverYn */ WITH LIMITCNT AS ( SELECT A.RCRITID ,LMT_CD ,CASE WHEN LMT_CD = ('225101' OR '225102') THEN 1 ELSE 2 END rnd_limit ,CASE WHEN LMT_CD = ('225101' OR '225103') THEN 1 ELSE 2 END packageindvd_limit FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_RCRIT A WHERE A.RCRITID = #{rcritid} LIMIT 1 ), CURCNT AS ( SELECT A.rndid AS RNDID ,SUM(A.QNTY) AS qnty ,CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(A.QNTY,0)) > (SELECT packageindvd_limit FROM LIMITCNT) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END isOverPakcageCnt FROM ( SELECT A.rndid AS RNDID ,SUM(IFNULL(A.QNTY,0)) AS qnty FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_APLY A INNER JOIN TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_RND B ON A.RNDID = B.RNDID WHERE 1=1 AND A.STTS_CD != '231103' AND A.STTS_CD != '231104' AND A.INSTID = (SELECT INSTID FROM TB_CMM_USER WHERE USERID = #{user.userid}) AND B.RCRITID = #{rcritid} GROUP by RNDID UNION ALL SELECT #{rndid} AS RNDID ,#{qnty } AS qnty ) A GROUP by A.RNDID ) SELECT (SELECT MAX(isOverPakcageCnt) FROM CURCNT) isOverPakcageCntYn ,(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(RNDID) FROM CURCNT) > (SELECT rnd_limit FROM limitcnt) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END )isOverRndCntYn ,(SELECT rnd_limit FROM LIMITCNT) rnd_limit ,(SELECT packageindvd_limit FROM LIMITCNT) packageindvd_limit

/* LendDao.selectLendAplyInfo */ SELECT A.APLYID ,A.APLCNTID ,A.INSTID ,A.RNDID ,A.PACKAGEID ,A.QNTY ,A.LEND_BGNG_DE ,A.LEND_END_DE ,A.STTS_CD ,A.DLVY_STTS_CD ,A.APLCNT_NM ,A.INST_NM ,A.TELNO ,A.EML ,A.EDU_CNT ,A.EDU_NOPE ,A.GRP_NM ,A.CTPRVN_CD ,A.RECPTR ,A.RECPTR_TELNO ,A.RECPTR_EML ,A.DLVY_ZIP ,A.DLVY_ADDR ,A.DLVY_ADDR_DTL ,A.HDRY_INST_CD ,A.INVCNO_DLIVY ,A.INVCNO_WRHOUSNG ,A.RVW_SCR ,A.RVW_CN ,A.RVW_FILEGRPID ,A.RVW_REG_DT ,A.REJECT_RSN ,A.MDFCN_DT ,A.MDFRID ,A.REG_DT ,A.RGTRID ,B.ORDR ,C.INST_TYPE_CD ,D.CTPRVN_NM AS CTPRVN_CD_NM ,E.PACKAGE_NM FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_APLY A INNER JOIN TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_RND B ON A.RNDID = B.RNDID INNER JOIN TB_CMM_INST C ON A.INSTID = C.INSTID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_ADDR_CTPRVN D ON A.CTPRVN_CD = D.CTPRVN_CD INNER JOIN tb_tha_package E ON A.PACKAGEID = E.PACKAGEID WHERE 1=1 AND APLYID = #{aplyid}

/* LendDao.selectLendAplyTrgtHistList */ SELECT A.APLYID ,A.RNDID ,A.PACKAGEINDVDID ,A.DLIVY_PRCS_DT ,A.WRHOUSNG_PRCS_DT ,A.DLIVY_PICID ,A.WRHOUSNG_PICID ,A.REG_DT ,A.RGTRID ,B.PACKAGEINDVD_NM ,B.INDVDNO ,CASE WHEN A.WRHOUSNG_PRCS_DT IS NULL AND WRHOUSNG_PICID IS NULL AND C.END_DE < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_LATE_YN FROM TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_APLY_DLIVY A INNER JOIN TB_THA_PACKAGEINDVD B ON A.PACKAGEINDVDID = B.PACKAGEINDVDID INNER JOIN TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_RND C ON A.RNDID = C.RNDID AND APLYID = #{aplyid}
mapper.update:
/* LendDao.updateLendAply */ UPDATE TB_THA_PACKAGE_LEND_APLY SET
STTS_CD = #{sttsCd},
DLVY_STTS_CD = #{dlvySttsCd },
INVCNO_DLIVY = #{invcnoDlivy },
INVCNO_WRHOUSNG = #{invcnoWrhousng},
RVW_SCR = #{rvwScr },
RVW_CN = #{rvwCn },
RVW_FILEGRPID = #{rvwFilegrpid },
RVW_REG_DT = NOW(),
MDFCN_DT = NOW() , MDFRID = #{user.userid } WHERE APLYID = #{aplyid}
